name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
prereq: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept; Legendary In Either Arcana Or Nature, Master In The Other
summary: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched.
description:
Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched. You gain two common 6th-level and 7th-level halcyon spells. You also gain a 6th-level halcyon spell slot and a 7th-level halcyon spell slot. Your proficiency rank in either arcane or primal spell DCs and spell attack rolls advances from expert to master.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
